Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: TartanTeddyBear
Reviews.Content: hotel changed name ibis styles berlin east hotel quiet residential student accom initial impressions daylight werent people feel safe walking night nearest station ubahn literally 5 mins walk hotel towards main thoroughfare frankfurter allee ubahn system regular trains alexanderplatz takes approx found pubs restaurants opposite direction head ubahn booked hotel approx 6 months travelling fantastic price hotel immaculate newly refurbished ibis distinct smell carpets clean welcoming extremely helpful staff available reception bar restaurant hours free wifi throughout building access pc reception breakfast cost €8 clean functional brand hd tv various channels inc bbc world news cnn beds duvets brand comfortable maybe hard mattress complaints bathroom appeared completed refurbished clean fantastic powerful shower hotel definitely stay berlin despite initial impressions

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, not a lovely area”
Reviews.Author: Cat_buxton
Reviews.Content: finally found hotel relieved staff welcoming comfortable little clinical search restaurant night surprised rougher poorly lit main street quiet punctuated youths smoking drinking fine day 9pm mother didnt feel safe walking streets hotel breakfast varied quality takes 15 mins underground city trek walk spend little stay time

Reviews.Title: “Great vaule for money”
Reviews.Author: tezzatrfc
Reviews.Content: spent 2 night hotel jan 12 hotel actually called ibis style hotel isnt central berlin tube stop 5 mins walk day ticket 5 euro single 90 mins hotel bathroom hotel clean couldnt fault price 10 visted ha hotel heating superb overall hotel fine party 12 stayed stay

Reviews.Title: “Agon changed to Ibis Styles, high value for money”
Reviews.Author: BalazsVegh
Reviews.Content: close frankfurter allee ubahn renovated probably ago friendly helpful staff wifi breakfast included recent policy ibis styles hotels neat bed comfortable bathroom clean parking court careful driving narrow corridor nice surprise highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Clean and not too touristy”
Reviews.Author: JulietNW
Reviews.Content: spent nights couple friend hotel remaining nights november 2011 hotel close station meaning easily clean staff friendly main reason picked hotel price hope real people live hoped spend time exploring touristy chance beaten track shower spacious decor outdated tv news 24 english didnt bother sleeping showering friend stayed hall table chairs handy socializing quiet slept walking soundproofing empty didnt sample breakfast typically german english people eating hangover youre looking decent priced hotel bathroom facilities located beaten track id recommend hotel lots facilities id suggest else perfect

Reviews.Title: “Took me nearly 2 years to get round to this!!”
Reviews.Author: Gav1968
Reviews.Content: im quickest writing reviews returning hotel march 2012 fair write hotel mind fantastic clean tidy efficiently run friendly staff plus powerful shower pins wall morning perfectly situated ubahn stop round corner onwards berlins fab transport system hotel priced imagine paying britain quality ripping punters british actually costing total £15000 3 days trip recession cant excuse pump price advice visiting berlin stay wont disappointed exactly tin roll march 2012

Reviews.Title: “Far better than expected!!”
Reviews.Author: Miniist
Reviews.Content: looking cheap stay berlin wasnt hostel travelling own wasnt ubahn wasnt dodgy sticks agon frankfurter allee ticked boxes positive reviews booked single 3 nights tube station literally 5min walk frankfurter allee shops eat slightly worried corner shop sells alcohol people corner drinking alcohol possibly homeless day night soon realised worry people kept themselves themselves bothered am woman blue hair hassled lol agon hotel nice modern actually dressed checking lol staff friendly answer questions reception waiting ages info expected decent expected clean looked brand impressed cleaners friendly folded towels neatly bed perfection bed comfy warm radiators nice cosy shower powerful hot space tv loads free channels lots lamps nice relaxing night location near alexanderplatz easy berlin u5 time definitely recommend hotel insist staying whenever berlin fantastic

Reviews.Title: “Great location, off the tourist track”
Reviews.Author: Stephanie P
Reviews.Content: amazing location walking distance ubahn stops 2 lines stones throw tons restaurants bars walking distance east wall didnt feel touristy highly recommend location hotel nice staff friendly switch dorm shower didnt basin youd simply close shower curtain section corner bathroom requested nonsmoking situated smoking courtyard pay upgrade switch worth stayed 6 nights definitely stay

Reviews.Content: hotel stay 5 nights bit confortable staff breakfast fantastic close metro station reach lot foot night nice bars walking distance

Reviews.Title: “Very nice stay.”

Reviews.Content: friend nice stay 4 nights april near ubahn st takes 10 minuts alexander platz quiet 108 facing backyard nice beds nice shower nice cleaning simple service stay wifi 9 euro 24 hours didnt reception pc internet free

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Position”

Reviews.Content: id endorse positive reports spent 5 days week hotel exactly described actually spent little time tended leave breakfast arrive 12 hours welcoming clean warm breakfast wouldnt spend lot time bedroom twin beds comfy shower powerful expect cheap prices wed stay berlin

Reviews.Title: “Perfect budget option”

Reviews.Content: paid £40 night double included amazing buffet breakfast morning hotel warm clean staff complaints free internet 10mins sort print handy maps etc staff knowledge tourist activities berlin location spot minutes’ walk form nearest ubahn quirky district goodcheap bars food recommend

Reviews.Content: staff helpful clean hotel meters ubahn metro station excellent breakfast included rate paid wife son family stayed hotel 4 nights fault hotel complain berlin welcome card rip advise people twice buy excludes main tourist attractions tourist cards useful bustrain ticket

Reviews.Content: deals hotel paid £48 night double 2 nights 4 couples weekend break berlin 2x stayed dont graffitti berlin travel links basic nice clean actually 102 wasnt bedside cabinets awkward shape bed 2 singles pushed comfortable clean functional friends layout sofa desk etc proper shaped didnt matter spent little time reception 24 hours nice clean beer bar breakfast adequate spread 710 940 sausages eggs etc lots cheese rolls cereal etc lots bars pubs restaurants nearby location recommend jewish memorial museum brandenberg gate tv tower avoid queues 11am fine

Reviews.Content: agon frankfurter allee hotel renovated building fancy means clean quiet comfortable staff friendly helpful adequate bit people adult son sleep cot squeezed corner included breakfast excellent hot cold entries served buffet style mentioned staff hotel located blocks ubahn easy connections berlins excellent public transportation system restaurants bars nearby finding eat computer lobby free internet access wifi youre expecting hilton marriott youre looking value convenience friendly staff definetly check enjoyed stay hesitate stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”

Reviews.Content: lovely friendly welcoming clean staff spoke english keen help lovely location central transport ie bahn bahn walking distance plenty surrounding walking distance comfortable beds pleasant breakfast

Reviews.Title: “I thoroughly recommend the Hotel Agon, you won't be disappointed”
Reviews.Author: TUPSJEO
Reviews.Content: wife spent 5 days hotel agon value money location wise situated heart east berlin look bit shabby adds vibrancy nearest ubahn 5 minute stroll 5 stops alexanderplatz breakfast included spread typical continent 10 minute walk simon strasse lots cheap bars cafes eateries vibrant scene stayed mitte preferred city hotel value base explore

Reviews.Content: hotel situated friedrichshain eastern berlins means quarter buzzing grown community multinational influences loads snuggly cafes stylish restaurants strange little shops service solid breakfast connection citycenter via metro fast look cafe
